pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cohort Generation for the OMOP Common Data Model // Generate cohorts and subsets using an Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model (CDM) Database. Cohorts are defined using 'CIRCE' (https://github.com/ohdsi/circe-be) or SQL compatible with 'SqlRender' (https://github.com/OHDSI/SqlRender).
